name: Grohak the Bloodied

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in Dungeons by 24%

skills.name: Hexdrinker Scimitar
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Unbound Anger
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Fills this champion's Turn Meter by 20% for each enemy under a [Decrease SPD] debuff
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Lord of War
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy and steals the target's Max Turn Meter.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Orcs
faction.default_description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Grohak the Bloodied is a legendary attack champion from the faction Orcs doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Orcs, Grohak the Bloodied is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Attack type
